amendment.description: To protect information that is reasonably believed to be personal information or information that identifies a specific person.

vote.text: Amendment SA 2548 not agreed to in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 47 - 49. Record Vote Number: 286.

action.text: Amendment SA 2548 proposed by Senator Burr for Senator Heller to Amendment SA 2716. (consideration: CR S7335; text as modified: CR S7335) To protect information that is reasonably believed to be personal information or information that identifies a specific person.
